subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Ron Smith and Allan Erbe coached David Wright for six years on the Virginia Blasters, an A.A.U. team, so they remember Wright’s exploits from when he was 10 until he was 16.
snippet: Ron Smith and Allan Erbe coached David Wright for six years on the Virginia Blasters, an A.A.U. team, so they remember Wright’s exploits from when he was 10 until he was 16.
